metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under.
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
Resource ID of the Application Insights instance

content.json:
# PrepBettr Resume Processing Analytics Dashboard

This dashboard provides comprehensive monitoring of the resume processing pipeline, including ATS optimization metrics, job matching performance, and system health indicators.

---

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name == "ResumeProcessed"
| summarize 
    TotalResumes = count(),
    SuccessfulProcessing = countif(customDimensions.success == "true"),
    FailedProcessing = countif(customDimensions.success == "false"),
    FoundryProcessing = countif(customDimensions.processingMethod == "foundry-document-intelligence"),
    LegacyProcessing = countif(customDimensions.processingMethod != "foundry-document-intelligence")
| extend 
    SuccessRate = round(100.0 * SuccessfulProcessing / TotalResumes, 1),
    FoundryAdoptionRate = round(100.0 * FoundryProcessing / TotalResumes, 1)
| project 
    TotalResumes, 
    SuccessfulProcessing, 
    FailedProcessing, 
    SuccessRate, 
    FoundryProcessing, 
    LegacyProcessing, 
    FoundryAdoptionRate
content.title: Resume Processing Summary

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name == "ResumeProcessingTime"
| summarize 
    AvgProcessingTime = avg(value),
    P50ProcessingTime = percentile(value, 50),
    P95ProcessingTime = percentile(value, 95),
    P99ProcessingTime = percentile(value, 99)
| extend 
    AvgProcessingTime = round(AvgProcessingTime, 0),
    P50ProcessingTime = round(P50ProcessingTime, 0),
    P95ProcessingTime = round(P95ProcessingTime, 0),
    P99ProcessingTime = round(P99ProcessingTime, 0)
content.title: Processing Performance (milliseconds)

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name == "ATSScore"
| summarize 
    TotalAnalyses = count(),
    AvgATSScore = avg(value),
    MinATSScore = min(value),
    MaxATSScore = max(value),
    P25ATSScore = percentile(value, 25),
    P50ATSScore = percentile(value, 50),
    P75ATSScore = percentile(value, 75),
    P95ATSScore = percentile(value, 95)
| extend 
    AvgATSScore = round(AvgATSScore, 1),
    P25ATSScore = round(P25ATSScore, 1),
    P50ATSScore = round(P50ATSScore, 1),
    P75ATSScore = round(P75ATSScore, 1),
    P95ATSScore = round(P95ATSScore, 1)
content.title: ATS Score Distribution

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name in ("ATSKeywordScore", "ATSFormatScore", "ATSStructureScore", "ATSContentScore")
| summarize AvgScore = avg(value) by name
| extend ComponentName = case(
    name == "ATSKeywordScore", "Keyword Analysis",
    name == "ATSFormatScore", "Format Analysis", 
    name == "ATSStructureScore", "Structure Analysis",
    name == "ATSContentScore", "Content Analysis",
    name
)
| project ComponentName, AvgScore = round(AvgScore, 1)
| order by AvgScore desc
content.title: ATS Component Scores

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name == "ATSScore"
| extend ScoreRange = case(
    value >= 90, "90-100 (Excellent)",
    value >= 80, "80-89 (Good)", 
    value >= 70, "70-79 (Average)",
    value >= 60, "60-69 (Below Average)",
    "0-59 (Poor)"
)
| summarize Count = count() by ScoreRange
| extend Percentage = round(100.0 * Count / toscalar(customMetrics | where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration}) | where name == "ATSScore" | count()), 1)
| order by Count desc
content.title: ATS Score Distribution by Range

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name == "JobMatchScore"
| summarize 
    TotalJobMatches = count(),
    AvgJobMatchScore = avg(value),
    P50JobMatchScore = percentile(value, 50),
    P95JobMatchScore = percentile(value, 95)
| extend 
    AvgJobMatchScore = round(AvgJobMatchScore, 1),
    P50JobMatchScore = round(P50JobMatchScore, 1),
    P95JobMatchScore = round(P95JobMatchScore, 1)
content.title: Job Matching Summary

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name in ("CriticalSkillGaps", "MissingKeywords")
| summarize AvgCount = avg(value), TotalCount = sum(value) by name
| extend MetricName = case(
    name == "CriticalSkillGaps", "Critical Skill Gaps",
    name == "MissingKeywords", "Missing Keywords",
    name
)
| project MetricName, AvgPerResume = round(AvgCount, 1), TotalAcrossPeriod = round(TotalCount, 0)
| order by AvgPerResume desc
content.title: Skill Gap Analysis

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name == "SemanticSimilarity"
| summarize 
    AvgSimilarity = avg(value),
    MinSimilarity = min(value),
    MaxSimilarity = max(value),
    P50Similarity = percentile(value, 50),
    P95Similarity = percentile(value, 95)
| extend 
    AvgSimilarity = round(AvgSimilarity, 3),
    MinSimilarity = round(MinSimilarity, 3),
    MaxSimilarity = round(MaxSimilarity, 3),
    P50Similarity = round(P50Similarity, 3),
    P95Similarity = round(P95Similarity, 3)
content.title: Semantic Similarity Effectiveness

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name == "FoundryTokensUsed"
| summarize 
    TotalTokensUsed = sum(value),
    AvgTokensPerOperation = avg(value),
    TokenUsageOperations = count()
| extend 
    TotalTokensUsed = round(TotalTokensUsed, 0),
    AvgTokensPerOperation = round(AvgTokensPerOperation, 0)
content.title: Token Usage Summary

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name == "FoundryModelUsage"
| summarize 
    Operations = count(),
    DistinctUsers = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.userId))
by 
    ModelType = tostring(customDimensions.modelType),
    Operation = tostring(customDimensions.operation)
| order by Operations desc
content.title: Model Usage by Type and Operation

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name == "FoundryCostEstimate"
| summarize 
    TotalEstimatedCost = sum(value),
    AvgCostPerOperation = avg(value),
    CostOperations = count()
| extend 
    TotalEstimatedCost = round(TotalEstimatedCost, 2),
    AvgCostPerOperation = round(AvgCostPerOperation, 4)
content.title: Cost Estimation (USD)

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name == "ResumeProcessingError"
| summarize 
    TotalErrors = count(),
    DistinctUsers = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.userId))
by 
    ErrorType = tostring(customDimensions.errorType),
    ProcessingMethod = tostring(customDimensions.processingMethod),
    Recovery = tostring(customDimensions.recovery)
| order by TotalErrors desc
content.title: Error Analysis by Type and Recovery

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name == "ResumeProcessingErrors"
| make-series ErrorCount = sum(value) on timestamp step 5m
| render timechart
content.title: Error Rate Trend

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= ago({TimeRange:duration})
| where name == "ResumeProcessingTime"
| make-series AvgProcessingTime = avg(value) on timestamp step 5m by tostring(customDimensions.processingMethod)
| render timechart
content.title: Processing Time Trend by Method

content.json:
## üìà Real-time Performance Indicators

content.title: KPI Health Dashboard
